iconf.title: Hadron Collider Physics Symposium 2008 - HCP08
iconf.description: The XIX Hadron Collider Physics Symposium will feature recent results from the TeVatron, RHIC, and HERA as well as plans and expectations for early physics results at the LHC which will begin to produce pp collisions in summer 2008. The symposium will be held at the Eagle Ridge Resort near the Mississippi, in Galena, Illinois, USA, from Tuesday May 27th through Saturday May 31st.
